tool_description: Extracts and engineers features from multiple data sources for machine learning model training and inference in search ranking.

query_data.description: JSON string containing processed query information

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to extract features for

include_user_context.description: Whether to include user context features

normalization_method.description: Feature normalization method: min_max, z_score, or none

error_messages: Invalid query data: Provide valid JSON string containing query information.
Empty product list: Provide at least one product ID.
Too many products: Maximum 1000 products can be processed in single request.
Invalid feature groups: Provide at least one feature group from [text, numerical, categorical, interaction, temporal].
Unsupported normalization: Use one of [min_max, z_score, none].
Feature extraction failed: Unable to extract features due to missing data or system error.
usage: Provide query_data and product_ids along with desired feature_groups. Configure inclusion flags and normalization_method to customize feature extraction for ML model training or inference.

feature_matrix.description: 2D array where each row represents features for a product

feature_names.description: Names of the extracted features in order

extraction_summary.description: Summary of the feature extraction process
